text:
I don’t know who needs to know this:

The new CTA Beta has what I think is a bug that prevents ‘saving’ changes when the ‘save contacts created as marketing contacts’ boolean is toggled in the cta theme field.

I can’t say if this is because I don’t have any ‘marketing contacts’ segment created, but it seems far from it.

Kindly share below, if you’ve had an experience with this.
Just tested this and looks the same for me
